abstract: Editorial celebrates announcement from Pres Obama that the last American soldier will leave Iraq by year's end; labels criticism from neo-conservatives accusing Pres Obama of abandoning Iraq 'foolish'.
snippet: President Obama’s announcement that the last American soldier would leave Iraq by year’s end signals a welcome end to the war.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: President Obama’s announcement that the last American soldier would leave Iraq by year’s end signals a welcome end to the war.
